Question
========

A researcher is interested in the effect of KiVA, an anti-bullying intervention for school-age children, on social-emotional well-being of bullied children. She hypothesizes that the effect of KiVA is to improve social relationships among children in the classroom, which affects the social-emotional well-being of bullied children. This effect would be strongest if teachers implement the program accurately.

What type of mediation is involved here? 
Answerlist
----------
* Sequential mediators
* Parallel mediators
* Moderated mediation
* Complete mediation

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
